articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Senegal and Morocco fined and players banned after African Cup final chaos - NPR
articles.description: Africa's soccer body issued fines worth more than $1 million and banned Senegal's coach and Senegalese and Morocco players Wednesday following a shambolic African Cup soccer final this month.
